description: What's this bag all about?Created in reaction to the rise of mighty TSA in American airports, the Commute 2.0 gets smarter every year. Its laptop compartment unzips to lie flat so you don't have to remove your laptop at airport security, and its waterproof TPU flap keeps your gear dry in a drizzle. Additionally, it has external water bottle pockets and a silly amount of internal organization for pens, mice, cords, and badges, and our beloved red key fob. Thou shall never dig for thy keys or be last through the security line again.
title: Timbuk2 Commute TSA-Friendly Messenger Bag
